snippet.title: Title Fight (Arcade) - Full Playthrough and Ending
snippet.description:
If this is your first visit and retro gaming is your thing click Subscribe!

Title fight is an amazing boxing game I played a lot growing up. The original unit was released with handles and the player could actually throw their own punches in the direction they wished. Even today the emulated version with the analog controls is still fun but unfortunately the game suffers from a glitch where you can't see the crowd or backgrounds. Overall the game is still fun and because it's not too long I hope you enjoy this video that showcases a full career. Thanks for watching and if you like what we do...
